Saw this crash at Lyft. I think this is another case of a mismatch between HCM stream state and codec stream state. I will look into this in relation to https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/issues/6872. cc @alyssawilk

title: crash in HCM/H2 due to stream mismatch
